name: Money Manager
author: vkurko

sections.description:
Money Manager is an easy-to-use multi-currency finance software. It helps organize personal or small business finances and keeps track of where, when and how the money goes.

The plugin allows you to manage an unlimited number of bank accounts in different currencies. You can record deposits and withdrawals as well as transfers between accounts.

Money Manager can create various types of reports, such as account summaries, income vs. expenses, etc.

Visit getmoneymanager.com for more information.

Key Features

  • Multi-currency including crypto
  • Double-entry system
  • Bank accounts
  • Transaction categories
  • Income/expenses tracking
  • Cash flow
  • CSV import
  • WooCommerce integration
sections.changelog:
1.31.0 | July 2, 2024

  • Added the ability to create a separate WooCommerce integration configuration for each payment method [1] using the Ultimate WooCommerce add-on

1.30.1 | May 2, 2024

  • Improved sorting so that it always takes into account the date and order in which transactions were created

1.30.0 | May 1, 2024

  • Added the ability to sort transactions by any column [1]

1.29.0 | February 14, 2024

  • Added the ability to create subcategories of unlimited nesting with the Extended Reports add-on [1]

1.28.0 | January 12, 2024

  • Added the ability to customize colors in Cash Flow chart [1]

1.27.1 | December 8, 2023

  • Fixed an issue with taking negative balances into account in the summary [1]

1.27.0 | October 25, 2023

  • Added the ability to specify the number of repetitions in the Recurring Transactions add-on

1.26.1 | September 26, 2023

  • Fixed an issue with files table for MySQL 5.7 users. The issue prevented the display of transactions in the new version of the plugin

1.26.0 | September 25, 2023

  • Added support for Split Transactions add-on [1]

1.25.0 | July 5, 2023

  • Added email notifications [1] in the Recurring Transactions add-on

1.24.0 | May 29, 2023

  • Added the ability to sync all existing WooCommerce orders with Money Manager [1] in the Ultimate WooCommerce add-on

1.23.2 | April 28, 2023

  • Fixed an issue with Albanian lek when 3 extra zeros were added
  • Fixed JS error related to displaying the budget when it should not be displayed

1.23.1 | April 21, 2023

  • Fixed plugin uninstall script

1.23.0 | April 20, 2023

  • Added support for Recurring Transactions add-on [1]

1.22.1 | April 5, 2023

  • Added support for outdated MySQL 5.6 [1]

1.22.0 | February 14, 2023

  • Added support for WordPress Multisite

1.21.1 | December 12, 2022

  • Fixed an issue with displaying dates in some time zones [1]

1.21.0 | November 28, 2022

  • Added the ability to manage the budget in Extended Reports [1]

1.20.0 | October 28, 2022

  • Added the ability to export transactions to CSV [1]

1.19.0 | October 24, 2022

  • Added the ability to specify the status of WooCommerce orders at which a transaction is created [1]

1.18.0 | September 1, 2022

  • Added support for Ultimate WooCommerce add-on [1] [2]

1.17.0 | July 26, 2022

  • Added display of the total amount for all periods in the Income and Expenses Extended Reports
  • Added the ability to view the counterparty chart in the Income and Expenses Extended Reports

1.16.0 | July 7, 2022

  • Added support for Extended Reports add-on [1]

1.15.2 | June 28, 2022

  • Fixed an issue with saving attachments

1.15.1 | June 28, 2022

  • Fixed an issue with not displaying added files
  • Added the ability to attach files when creating a transaction

1.15.0 | June 27, 2022

  • Added the ability to attach files to transactions

1.14.0 | June 23, 2022

  • Added the ability to manage Money Manager add-ons from the admin panel

1.13.1 | June 14, 2022

  • Companion update for the Frontend Reports add-on

1.13.0 | May 26, 2022

  • Added support for Frontend Reports add-on [1]
  • Fixed translation issue [2]

1.12.0 | March 25, 2022

  • Added the ability to use arbitrary currency, including cryptocurrency

1.11.0 | March 13, 2022

  • Added the ability to specify visible columns in the list of transactions [1]

1.10.1 | February 18, 2022

  • Added an index to the database table to improve performance

1.10.0 | February 17, 2022

  • Added filter by year for income and expenses on the Summary page [1]
  • Added total in the right column in the Cash Flow report [1]
  • Added ‘drag to scroll’ capability for the table in the Cash Flow report

1.9.1 | December 25, 2021

  • Fixed an issue with incorrect currency actual exchange rate [1]

1.9.0 | November 30, 2021

  • Added advanced filter in transactions

1.8.0 | November 24, 2021

  • Added integration with WooCommerce [1]

  • Added All transactions

  • Fixed issue with blurring charts
